item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting: Police recover gunman's rifle and 'good video footage'
item.description: Kirk, a close ally of President Donald Trump, was killed by a gunman during a political event at Utah Valley University in Orem.

item.title: ‘The country will heal’ after Charlie Kirk’s assassination, Trump tells CNBC
item.description: President Donald Trump told CNBC's Joe Kernen that he believes "the country will heal" in the wake of conservative activist Charlie Kirk's assassinati...

item.title: Who was Charlie Kirk, Trump ally and conservative activist?
item.description: Google trends showed a spike in searches of the phrase, "Who is Charlie Kirk" as news spread of the conservative activist's shooting on Wednesday.

item.title: Manhunt for Charlie Kirk shooter expands after two people detained had no links to killing, FBI says
item.description: Authorities are searching for the gunman who assassinated political activist Charlie Kirk at an event in Utah. Kirk was a close ally of President Dona...

item.title: ‘Here we go’: Trump responds to Russia’s drone incursion on a NATO ally. But what comes next?
item.description: Western officials have called for tougher sanctions against Moscow in response to Russia's drone incursion into Poland.
